articles.content: The Department of Culture, Media and Sport has given the green light for 8,000 spectators to attend as part of the UK Governments Events Research Programme. A proportion of these tickets will be made… [+530 chars]

articles.author: Oliver Holt
articles.title: OLIVER HOLT: England must embrace Jack Grealish's talent ahead of the Euros - Daily Mail
articles.description: OLIVER HOLT - CHIEF SPORTS WRITER: If Grealish recovers from the shin injury and picks up for Aston Villa against Fulham where he left off, he should be pressing for a place in England's XI vs Croatia.
articles.content: It is time to stop indulging the idea that Jack Grealish should be sweating on his place in the England squad for this summers European Championship. If there were a plane to board, Grealish should b… [+7297 chars]
